description: This vegan chicken salad is amazing piled on a sandwich, stuffed in a wrap, or on top of a crunchy salad! Made with protein-packed seitan, hearty chickpeas, and creamy vegan mayo seasoned with fresh dill and scallions. Whip up a batch for lunch today!
keywords: seitan recipes, vegan lunch, vegan sandwich recipe
name: Vegan Chicken Salad
recipeIngredient: 1 cup cooked or canned chickpeas, (drained, rinsed and lightly mashed)
8 ounces seitan (about 1/2 batch if using homemade), finely diced)
1/2 cup slivered or sliced roasted almonds
1/4 cup vegan mayo (or more if youâ€™d like a creamier salad)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chickpeas into a medium bowl and roughly mash them with a fork or potato masher.
Add the remaining ingredients and stir until fully mixed.
Taste-test and adjust any seasonings to your liking.
